News.Title: Shringar House Board Meet on Feb 11 for Q3FY26 Results
News.Summary: Shringar House of Mangalsutra Limited has scheduled its board meeting for February 11, 2026, to consider and approve Q3FY26 unaudited financial results for quarter ended December 31, 2025.

News.Title: Shringar House Opens New Branch in Pune
News.Summary: Shringar House of Mangalsutra Limited inaugurated a new branch in Pune, Maharashtra on January 23, 2026, as part of its expansion strategy to strengthen operational presence across the region.

News.Title: Shringar House of Mangalsutra Reports IPO Fund Utilization for Quarter Ended September 30, 2025
News.Summary: Shringar House of Mangalsutra Limited submitted its monitoring agency report for IPO proceeds utilization for the quarter ended September 30, 2025. The company raised Rs 4,009.20 million through its IPO held from September 9-12, 2025. Out of the total proceeds, Rs 2,714.15 million was utilized for working capital requirements including purchase of gold bars, loan repayments, and security deposits. Rs 347.15 million was spent on issue expenses including fees to merchant bankers and legal counsel. No funds were utilized for general corporate purposes during the quarter. Rs 930.81 million remains unutilized and is held in cash credit accounts and fixed deposits with Kotak Bank. The monitoring report was prepared by CRISIL Ratings Limited and reviewed by the company's Audit Committee. The company operates in the gems and jewellery sector and had expanded its manufacturing capacity by 35% between 2023 and 2025.

News.Title: Shringar House of Mangalsutra Reports Strong Q2 Growth with Revenue Up 26% Year-on-Year
News.Summary: Shringar House of Mangalsutra delivered robust quarterly performance with revenue rising to 5.3 billion rupees from 4.2 billion rupees year-on-year. Net profit increased significantly to 229 million rupees compared to 160 million rupees in the same period last year. EBITDA grew to 327 million rupees from 244 million rupees year-on-year, while EBITDA margin improved to 6.18% from 5.86% in the previous year period.

News.Title: Shringar House of Mangalsutra Reports 68% Jump in Quarterly Net Profit
News.Summary: Shringar House of Mangalsutra reported net profit of 285 million rupees for the quarter, compared to 170 million rupees in the same period last year. The company's revenue increased to 3.3 billion rupees from 2.7 billion rupees year-over-year.
